properties.title: Nabla : Development Standards : Logging rules and exception handling

subsection.name: Nabla logs
subsection.div:
Nabla property files :
application.log contains the main events of the application : loading of services,plugins, etc
error.log contains unexpected events.

section.name: Exception handling
section.p: All exceptions must be written in a log file.
The catch blocks must never be empty and should not call for e.printStackTrace()

subsection.name: Application exception
subsection.p: The application exceptions, such as UserActionException, are the only ones which need not being logged because they are used in normal execution of the application.
